Nomi:
The buff you will receive is this, that, and that.But if your level is 91 or above, you cannot receive it.
Horn Melody / Drum Melody / Pipe Organ MelodyGuitar Melody / Harp Melody / Lute MelodyPrevailing Sonata / Daring Sonata / Refreshing SonataYou can receive these buffs as a group.
You will have to choose one from Knight's Harmony / Warrior's Harmony / Wizard's Harmony.
